yokTra:
**A Yokai will only hear players/equipment near it during hunts.** 
To test this: break line of sight with the ghost, while your flashlight is on. 
A Yokai wouldn't detect your flashlight, while other ghosts would chase you down.

Can Hunt at 80% Sanity if anyone is talking nearby.
yokAbi:
When a player is talking near it, the Yokai has a chance to trigger a hunt, **if you are below 80% sanity.** 
***Early hunting ghost.***
